data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: The motor coughed, jerked and the warning light flashed, jeez outta gas! It's a good five miles to the next town and its blowing a blizzard out there. This weather is due to set in for weeks, so I can't stay here. I've got a tank of diesel in the trunk for the tractor, so I'll have to use that. It'll ruin the petrol engine, but at least it will get me to the next town, or at least most of the way there. Hopefully they will will be able to pump and flush the engine before it is completely ruined.
data.original_output: The motor coughed, jerked and the warning light flashed, jeez outta gas! It's a good five miles to the next town and its blowing a blizzard out there. This weather is due to set in for weeks, so I can't stay here. I've got a tank of diesel in the trunk for the tractor, so I'll have to use that. It'll ruin the petrol engine, but at least it will get me to the next town, or at least most of the way there. Hopefully they will will be able to pump and flush the engine before it is completely ruined.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: It's time to sell the collection. I'll send an email to the dealer and see if they are interested in my collection of "completes" from Tonga. My collection consists of circa 500 of the latter, all of which date back to the latter half of the 19th century and as you know "complete", means envelope, letter and stamp(s), so it should be a valuable lot

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: Donation is mandatory for the empire to survive. Some will not comply, but forcible removal of an organ is traumatic and often leads to severe mental illness. We learn this in our early years, so most are ready for the procedure, but some do question. We have to keep our best and most talented alive for as long as possible if we are to find a solution to

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: The gloom continues to persist. We exist with it. It's the only way. It is after all payment for the way we treated our planet. There is no solution now, other than for nature to take its course. We like other species are dying out. It's a slow process. Some like me know there is a future, like there has been before. It's just that we won't be there to see it. For now we
